body_html:
According to #4984 you're using CentOS 6 which isn't in our support matrix. I really appreciate the time you put into sending this pull request. But I'm going to close this issue. I encourage you to send us a pull request adding a check to our ./configure for .el6. in the uname -a output that shows:

CentOS 6 is not supported and probably won't work.
Consider using Docker or trying the tensorflow/contrib/makefile build system.
Want to continue anyway? [Yn]

This should hopefully help save time for many people in the future.

Also I'm going to update this issue when my change is committed regarding SWIG hermeticity.

body:
According to #4984 you're using CentOS 6 which isn't in our support matrix. I really appreciate the time you put into sending this pull request. But I'm going to close this issue. I encourage you to send us a pull request adding a check to our `./configure` for `.el6.` in the `uname -a` output that shows:

```
CentOS 6 is not supported and probably won't work.
Consider using Docker or trying the tensorflow/contrib/makefile build system.
Want to continue anyway? [Yn]
```

This should hopefully help save time for many people in the future.

Also I'm going to update this issue when my change is committed regarding SWIG hermeticity.
